name: Bad Vibes (TT6022)
description:
This is my first published game. Its a demo for a simple game I came up with. I'm hoping to port this to phones as a simple, free game that anyone can learn and play. I currently have a few projects planned for this upcoming summer of 2023, so stay tuned to see what I'm up to in the future.

I'll continue to develop this until I have a small, functioning, fun game to play when you're idle. If you have any suggestions, feel free to give me some ideas! I'll probably add any ideas I get because I don't have a particular goal for this game yet. I'll probably make levels in the future to provide more structure, although it is unlikely there will be a story at all due to the simplicity of the game.

Developed on Unity (2D package) with the Unity Personal license, sound effects from jsfxr website.
